title: Heaven's Bait
description: A struggling Soul, a binding contract, and the hope to find her way home, leave Annie no choice but to fight with everything she has. Fighting for her fleshly body in a spiritual world makes the battle even harder. When bad choices lead her through a demon infested forest and plop her at Satanâ€™s door, Annie is torn between faith and fear. Does she have the strength to make it through or will the outcome leave her entrapped forever?
author: Diane Theiler
